Sentencas: La(Ca)CrO3 (LCC) powders have been prepared through a novel gel combustion route using metal nitrates as oxidizers and ethylene diamine tetraacetic acid (EDTA) as a fuel.
Titulo: Synthesis of nanocrystalline La(Ca)CrO3 through a novel gel combustion process and its characterization

Sentencas: The process involves the combustion of a viscous gel obtained through mixed metal nitrate-EDTA solution.
Titulo: Synthesis of nanocrystalline La(Ca)CrO3 through a novel gel combustion process and its characterization

Sentencas: The effect of amount of EDTA used in the process on the nature of combustion reaction, phase formation, and densification has been studied.
Titulo: Synthesis of nanocrystalline La(Ca)CrO3 through a novel gel combustion process and its characterization

Sentencas: It was found that use of the fuel-rich precursor facile in controlling the reaction, which in turn helps in the scale up of the batch size.
Titulo: Synthesis of nanocrystalline La(Ca)CrO3 through a novel gel combustion process and its characterization

Sentencas: The calcination of the fuel-rich gel precursor at 650 degrees C resulted in the well-crystalline LCC along with a small amount of calcium chromate as a secondary phase.
Titulo: Synthesis of nanocrystalline La(Ca)CrO3 through a novel gel combustion process and its characterization

Sentencas: The HRSEM studies on the powder showed agglomerated nanoparticles.
Titulo: Synthesis of nanocrystalline La(Ca)CrO3 through a novel gel combustion process and its characterization

Sentencas: The average agglomerate size was found to be 0.54 mu m.
Titulo: Synthesis of nanocrystalline La(Ca)CrO3 through a novel gel combustion process and its characterization

Sentencas: The cold pressing and sintering of the calcined powder at 1250 degrees C resulted in the mono-phasic La0.70Ca0.30CrO3 with 94% of its theoretical density The sintered sample exhibited conductivity of 51 S/cm at 1000 degrees C.
Titulo: Synthesis of nanocrystalline La(Ca)CrO3 through a novel gel combustion process and its characterization

Sentencas: The average linear thermal expansion coefficient was found to be 10.3 x 10(-6) C-1.
Titulo: Synthesis of nanocrystalline La(Ca)CrO3 through a novel gel combustion process and its characterization
